input.description:
String Value - The name of a configuration entry defined in a configuration module.
Example: BMC_AR_System

An XML document providing the data template for single or multiple Concept elements.The work order concept is an XML document containing specific elements used to assign multiple values to a single context item. Each value is associated with an element of the Concept.

String value - The name of the work order template.
Example:Example: Install Software Application

output.description: String Value - Count of successful work orders
String Value - Count of work orders that failed creation.

An XML document that contains detail for one or more successful work orders.
sample :
<work-orders> <work-order> <work-order-id>WO0000000000170</work-order-id> </work-order> <work-order> <work-order-id>WO0000000000171</work-order-id> </work-order> <work-order> <work-order-id>WO0000000000172</work-order-id> </work-order> </work-orders>
An XML document containing failed work orders.

An XML document - consolidated success status from each output.
Sample:
<work-orders> <work-order> <success-status>success</success-status> <work-order-description>summary for first work order</work-order-description> </work-order> <work-order> <success-status>success</success-status> <work-order-description>summary for second work order</work-order-description> </work-order> <work-order> <success-status>success</success-status> <work-order-description>summary for third work order</work-order-description> </work-order> </work-orders>

An XML document - consolidated status message from each output.
Sample: <work-orders> <work-order> <status-message>Work order created successfully</status-message> <work-order-description>summary for first work order</work-order-description> </work-order> <work-order> <status-message>Work order created successfully</status-message> <work-order-description>summary for second work order</work-order-description> </work-order> <work-order> <status-message>Work order created successfully</status-message> <work-order-description>summary for third work order</work-order-description> </work-order> </work-orders>

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <work-orders /> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>
<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <work-orders /> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

xpath-expression.xpath: concat("Work Order template not found for template name : ", .)
concat("Work Order template not found for template name : ", .)
(string-length(.)>0 and string('${work order template present}'='true')) or ('${work order template present}'="false") or ('${configuration name}' != 'BMC_AR_System')

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <WorkOrder> <template-id> <xsl:if test="string-length('${template id}') > 0"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${template id}</xsl:text> </xsl:if> </template-id> <xsl:for-each select="//*[local-name()='WorkOrder']/*"> <xsl:copy-of select="." /> </xsl:for-each> </WorkOrder> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

call-process.process-name: :AutoPilot-OA-Work_Order_Management:Utilities:Translate Field Values to Enumerated Values for Single Work Order

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length('${work order description}') > 0"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[work order description]</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[template summary]</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <work-order> <success-status> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">failure</xsl:text> </success-status> <work-order-id> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </work-order-id> </work-order> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <work-order> <status-message> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Unknown system "${system}"</xsl:text> </status-message> <work-order-id> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </work-order-id> </work-order> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="@*|node()"> <xsl:if test="not(@name="")"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()" /> </xsl:copy> </xsl:if> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <item> <schema>${schema name}</schema> <fields>${fields}</fields> </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length('${work order description}') > 0"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[work order description]</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[template summary]</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(//error/text()) > 0"> <xsl:value-of select="//error/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Unable to create work order</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <work-order> <success-status>${success status}</success-status> <work-order-description> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </work-order-description> </work-order> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <work-order> <status-message>${status message}</status-message> <work-order-description> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </work-order-description> </work-order> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <WorkOrder> <request-id> <xsl:if test="string-length('${request-id}') > 0"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${request-id}</xsl:text> </xsl:if> </request-id> <xsl:for-each select="//*[local-name()='WorkOrder']/*"> <xsl:copy-of select="." /> </xsl:for-each> </WorkOrder> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <work-order> <work-order-id> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </work-order-id> </work-order> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length('${work order description}') > 0"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[work order description]</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[template summary]</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <work-order> <success-status>${success status}</success-status> <work-order-description> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </work-order-description> </work-order> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <work-order> <status-message>${status message}</status-message> <work-order-description> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </work-order-description> </work-order> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length('${work order description}') > 0"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[work order description]</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[template summary]</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <work-order> <success-status>${success status}</success-status> <work-order-description> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </work-order-description> </work-order> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <work-order> <status-message>${status message}</status-message> <work-order-description> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </work-order-description> </work-order> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <work-orders> <xsl:copy-of select="./node()/*" /> ${ss} </work-orders> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <work-orders> <xsl:copy-of select="./node()/*" /> ${sm} </work-orders> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <work-orders> <xsl:copy-of select="./node()/*" /> ${failed work order} </work-orders> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="location" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <work-orders> <xsl:copy-of select="node()/*" /> ${work order} </work-orders> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: This workflow will create single or multiple work orders
